example: I have an appointment with my dentist tomorrow.
logic: DENT (牙齿) + IST (专家) - 牙科领域的专业人士

example: The pharmacist filled my prescription in a few minutes.
logic: 在药房 (PHARMACY) 工作的人

example: You can buy over-the-counter medicine at the pharmacy.
logic: PHARMAKON (药) - 药品的存储与分发地

example: She is seeing a psychiatrist for her anxiety.
logic: PSYCH (灵魂) + IATR (治疗) - 能开药的灵魂医生

example: A psychologist can help you understand your behavior.
logic: PSYCH (心理) + OLOGY (学问) - 研究心理机制的学者

example: He works as a physical therapist at a rehab center.
logic: 从事特定治疗 (THERAPY) 工作的人

example: The surgeon performed a successful heart operation.
logic: 源自手部工作，指通过手术进行治疗的医生

example: She was referred to a heart specialist.
logic: 在特定领域 (SPECIAL) 深入研究的专家

example: The patient is recovering well after the surgery.
logic: PATI (忍受) - 正在忍受病痛折磨的人

example: A GP can treat a variety of common illnesses.
logic: GENERAL (普遍的) - 负责全方位初级诊治的医生

example: The pediatrician checked the baby’s growth.
logic: PED (儿童) + IATR (治疗) - 儿童疾病专家

example: She visited a clinic for a check-up.
logic: CLIN (躺) - 原指医生巡视病床，现指小型医疗机构

example: The operation will be done in the new operating room.
logic: 进行手术 (OPERATION) 的专门空间

example: He was rushed to the emergency room.
logic: 处理突发 (EMERGE) 紧急病情的场所

example: Her grandmother lives in a nursing home.
logic: 提供长期护理 (NURSE) 服务的居住地

example: The doctor made a quick diagnosis of pneumonia.
logic: DIA (贯穿) + GNO (认知) - 通过症状看透疾病本质

example: She was diagnosed with diabetes.
logic: 判定某种疾病的存在

example: The doctor gave me a prescription for antibiotics.
logic: PRE (提前) + SCRIPT (写) - 医生预先写好的用药指令

example: He prescribed some painkillers for my injury.
logic: 书面指示某种治疗或药物

example: The patient is responding well to the treatment.
logic: 对病患进行的护理与医治过程

example: Doctors treated him for a lung infection.
logic: 动词：采取医疗手段

example: She underwent physical therapy after her injury.
logic: 非手术、通常是长期的恢复性治疗

example: Psychotherapy helped him overcome his trauma.
logic: 灵魂 (PSYCHE) 与疗法 (THERAPY) 的结合

example: Chemotherapy is often used to treat cancer.
logic: CHEMICAL (化学药物) + THERAPY

example: He needed surgery to fix a broken bone.
logic: 涉及切开身体的医疗操作

example: Rehabilitation can take several months.
logic: RE (重新) + HABIL (使有能力) - 恢复原有功能

example: Take your medication twice a day.
logic: 具体的药物或服药的过程

example: Modern medicine has advanced rapidly.
logic: 治疗伤病的学科或物质

example: He needs urgent medical attention.
logic: 形容与医生或治疗相关的

example: The doctor prescribed an antibiotic.
logic: ANTI (抗) + BIO (生命/细菌) - 对抗微生物的药

example: Antiviral drugs can reduce flu symptoms.
logic: ANTI (抗) + VIR (病毒)

example: Use antiseptic cream on the cut.
logic: ANTI (抗) + SEPT (腐败/细菌感染)

example: Antibodies help fight infection.
logic: 身体内产生的对抗外来物质的防御蛋白

example: The COVID-19 vaccine saved many lives.
logic: VACCA (牛) - 源于最早预防天花的牛痘

example: Children are vaccinated against measles.
logic: 通过注射疫苗使身体获得免疫

example: Immunization protects children from diseases.
logic: 使人获得免疫力 (IMMUNE) 的过程

example: After vaccination, you become immune to the virus.
logic: MUN (职责) + IM (免除) - 原指免税，现指免于疾病

example: Diplomats are immune from prosecution.
logic: 在法律或制度层面上的“免疫”

example: She works in the radiology department.
logic: RADIO (射线) + OLOGY (学科)

example: Neurology studies the nervous system.
logic: NEUR (神经) + OLOGY

example: Pathology helps identify diseases.
logic: PATHOS (疾病/痛苦) + OLOGY

example: Immunology is crucial for vaccine development.
logic: 研究免疫系统的学科
